divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed by my room mate. She stated it's ok to report it and she would talk to you. At approx. 9:30pm, on September 12th, 2013, she was standing out side in the driveway talking on her phone. She said she looked up at the stars and saw a bright star begin to sparkle then it exploded. A few minutes later, she saw another bright star start to sparkle and she took a picture with her phone and caught it right when it exploded. When they disintegrated, light projected from both sides. When she first told me about this, I thought she might have seen a supernova. When she said it happened the second time a few minutes later, I thought it should be reported to you. She texted me the photo and I have texted it to my e-mail. Looking at the photo, it looks like a cloud around the actual explosion or disintegration. When I am home I can e-mail it to you or I can text it to you at any time.
trends: There have been no other sightings in St. Augustine
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: starlike started sparking then exploded-took about 10 seconds
